媌媌媌
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

媌字的基本解释

媌
miáo
眉目美好：“简郑卫之处子娥媌靡曼者，施芳泽，正蛾眉。”
妓女。

媌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miáo］
［《廣韻》莫交切，平肴，明。］
［《廣韻》莫飽切，上巧，明。］
亦作“嫹1”。
纤美；美好。

媌字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媌； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第27
【廣韻】莫交切【集韻】謨交切，?音茅。【說文】目裏好也。【揚子·方言】凡好而輕者謂之娥，關東河濟之閒謂之媌。【註】今關西人亦呼美好爲媌，閩人謂妓女爲媌。　又【集韻】莫飽切。同㚹。又眉敎切。同㑤。又謨沐切，音木。義?同。

媌字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
媌字的起名意思

纤美；美好。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
miáo
The eyebrows are beautiful: "Jian Zhengwei, who is the one who is the Era of the Man, Shi Fangze, has the eyebrows straight."
prostitute.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miáo］
["Guangyun" must not be cross-cut, flat food, bright. ]
["Guangyun" is not full of cuts, clever, clear. ]
Also known as "嫹1".
Slim; beautiful.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媌; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 266-27
[Guang Yun] Mo intertwined [Ji Yun] Mo intertwined,? Yin Mao. [Said the text] The item is good. [Yangtze Dialect] Whatever is good and light is called Zhi'e, and the leisure of Guandong River is called Zhi'e. [Note] Nowadays, people in Guanxi also call beauty as a prostitute, and Fujianese call prostitutes as prostitutes.　[Jiyun] Don’t be full of cuts. Same as 㚹. Cut his eyebrows again. Same as 㑤. Mo Muqie again, Yinmu. Righteous? Same.
